casebody.data:
B & B HARDWARE, INC., petitioner
v.
HARGIS INDUSTRIES, INC., dba Sealtite Building Fasteners, dba East Texas Fasteners, et al. No. 13-352. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
